Title: Xmas Party
Plot: As the only person to have volunteered for the job, Will is elected Chairman of the Organization Party for the end of term Christmas bash and ropes the other three boys into being his assistants. Simon, needless to say, is keen to use the opportunity to declare his public love for Carli D'Amato, which proves to be anything but a good idea.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
